attributes.action: Get Leeds City Council to Re-Open Pontefract Lane.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a result of the new East Leeds link Road being opened (A63) Pontefract Lane between Newsom Green Road & the A63 has been closed.

This is a pain for a lot of people, We request that Leeds City Council Re-Open Pontefract Lane to public road users.

It is afterall a Public Road, and isn't that what we pay our road tax for.
